about_the_game:
A young man named Aidan always dreamed of adventures, although he knew that the son of the village blacksmith could not count on them. Or rather, he did not have to - until one day a mysterious stranger appeared in the village...



True Magician is a non-linear narrative game with RPG elements in the vein of Sorcery! and Choice of Magics, with a story about becoming an apprentice royal magician. Here ancient secrets intertwine with the intrigues of the court, danger lurks where you least expect it, and magic grants its adherents incredible abilities - or destroys them irrevocably.

Pass many tests, discover Aydan's true potential, master the forbidden magic of the Void and become a true wizard! But be careful, because sometimes witchcraft attracts the attention of Those whose voices come from the other world.

Game Features:


One hundred thousand words are not the limit
In a large and exciting story, for which one of the writers of For the People is responsible, much is not what it seems, and the characters pursue their own goals.

See with your own eyes
The usual text game descriptions are enlivened by art created specifically for the game, conveying the atmosphere of the game, whether it's a village lost in the mountains or a parallel reality.

Choice Matters
Aidan's enemies and friends (and maybe more than friends...), his mastery of this or that school of magic, even the fate of the kingdom - it all depends on the decisions the player makes. Be careful - some of the consequences will be unpredictable.

Real Magic.
Different magical disciplines, reality-changing artifacts, narrative duels between sorcerers... True Magician is a game about the art of magic in its various forms.

Fight!
Combat system of the game combines simplicity with dynamics and variability. Different types of weapons and armor, as well as an assortment of spells are available to the player.

Items matter
In True Magician a spear or a magic ring isn't just a perk to your stats. The inventory used by the player affects the narrative and, in some cases, the development of the story, as well as the player's abilities in combat depend on the items.

short_description: How do you become a true magician? Find out in True Magician, an interactive text adventure with RPG elements. Travel through the kingdom with your teacher, learn the art of magic, fight enemies and make friends. And remember, the world is not what it seems!
